 Expected code:
# Preset variables:
X <- c(1,2,3,4)
Y <- c(4,3,2,1)
Z <- 1:1000

# The code:
t00 <- X * 2
t01 <- c(1,2,3,4) + X + Y
t02a <- round(Z*pi,1)
t02b <- (sum(round(Z*pi,1) == round((1:1000)*pi,1)) == 1000)
t03 <- t01 * 2 #A: c(2 4 6 8)
t04 <- t03[t03 > 4] #A: c(6 8)
t05 <- X + t01 #A: c(2,4,6,8)
